RuleName: Does DiagPtr contain the one we want to replace (OrigPtr)?

ChildRules.RuleName: Does it also contain the replacement pointer (NewPtr)?

Attributes._Description: "If so there is no need to do a swap.  This is a case where a line points to more than one pointer."

ChildRules.RuleName: Does it contain the pointer to swap to?

Attributes._Description: "If so there is no need to do a swap."
"If so the 1 needs to be replaced with the pointer where the pregancy diagnosis code used to be.  Set it to X."
